name: There'll Be Hell to Play
description:
Collected demented, unstable plushies to repair the border between hell and the living world.

There once was a quaint little plush shop, which unbeknownst to the owner, lied right on the border between earth and hell. One day, the contrast, the two conflicting ideas of pure innocence and pure evil created an unstability in the world, and hell’s power overcame the plush store. It’s your job, and your job alone, to remove these corrupted plushies, and use their power to overcome their master, Satan.

Controls:

Space: Drop Claw and Use UI

Left and Right to move the claw

Down in the selection menu to view your plushie dex
